thread.title: Security Flaw Allowed Attackers to Take Control Over PCs Connected to a Huawei 4G USB Modem
thread.title_full: Security Flaw Allowed Attackers to Take Control Over PCs Connected to a Huawei 4G USB Modem - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Security Flaw Allowed Attackers to Take Control Over PCs Connected to a Huawei 4G USB Modem
text: A serious security flaw was fixed in the Huawei E3272s 4G USB Modem, one which could have easily allowed attackers to gain control over PCs in which the modem was inserted. According to Timur Yunusov and Kirill Nesterov, the two security experts that help find and fix the issue, "the vulnerability may lead to a DOS attack and remote arbitrary code execution via an XSS attack or stack overflow." Attackers sending malicious crafted network packets to the modem would have b... Â»
